comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Kaulen, a German balloonist, set the world's long-distance flight record in 1913, when he and two passengers covered 1865 miles in a balloon.  The record was still standing in 1927.

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: I started an entry for him in Wikipedia: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hugo_Kaulen
